overview: Bryan Adams performs live at Elgin Theatre, Toronto, ON, Canada. SETLIST: 01 - Run To You, 02 - God Only Knows, 03 - The Only Thing That Looks Good On Me Is You, 04 - (Everything I Do) I Do It For You, 05 - Cuts Like A Knife, 06 - She Knows Me, 07 - When You're Gone, 08 - Summer Of '69, 09 - 18 Til I Die, 10 - Heaven, 11 - It's Only Love, 12 - Straight From The Heart, 13 - All For Love
title: Bryan Adams - Live in Toronto 2014
